title: A Speaker In An Ammo Box?
description: Thodio .50 A-BOX -   This might just be the best sounding bluetooth speaker we've ever tested in the Unbox Therapy HQ.  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
transcript: - What's up, guys? Lou here, back with another video. And as you can tell in front of me I have... An unusual object. This thing came in some unmarked cardboard. I had no idea what it was or what to expect, and I started to pull it out, I'm like, "Oh my goodness." That's an ammunition box. Our people sending me ammunition? This obviously is not that. Something that's really cool here is you can actually crack this thing open and look at the internal components. Look at that. Woah, you can see the driver units here. Fairly substantial in size. A power switch over here on the side. It also acts as the volume switch, too. And then over here on this side, you got a USB port. I'm assuming that's gonna be used to charge up whichever device you're using to feed audio into this. Power, mini jack, and an antenna. It seems to be that the company here, the name of the company is thoh-dio, or thah-dio. Probably thah-dio. Thah-dio or thoh-dio. I assume it's gonna be the power brick. Yes, sir. What looks like a pretty high quality, actually, mini jack cable, mini jack cable and it says professional, low noise audio cable. Why do we have an antenna? Is there a radio in here? Well, there's no way to control the radio. Is it Bluetooth? Maybe it does, let's boot it up and see. What's cool here is you can actually get a little light. See that little light in there?
